【大嫂馭夫術】與陶子結婚16年如何保鮮？　李李仁一句話閃瞎眾人
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 娛樂組
周杰倫與昆凌結婚4年，常在社群網站曬恩愛，夫妻倆感情緊密惹人羨，其實，演藝圈內感情保鮮的佳偶很多，陶晶瑩與李李仁、賈靜雯與修杰楷，大陸女星張歆藝與袁弘等，都是婚姻好示範。



陶晶瑩（陶子）與李李仁結婚16年，育有一雙兒女的他們時常曬恩愛，提及婚姻保鮮的祕訣，兩人常抽空約會，李李仁曾當眾誇陶子是他生活中不可或缺的伴侶，他說：「我不信教、不拜神，我只相信我自己和老婆。」


賈靜雯曾在《賈如幸福慢點來》書中，分享認定修杰楷為終生的過程。（翻攝自賈靜雯臉書）

相差9歲的姐弟戀，賈靜雯與修杰楷在2015年修成正果，賈靜雯曾在《賈如幸福慢點來》書中分享認定對方為終生的過程，修杰楷為了表達他的真心，曾經對賈靜雯說：「妳答應我，如果有一天我先走了，妳一定要再找一個人來愛妳。」而正是這句話，讓她確認了修杰楷是她可以託付終生的人。只要兩人吵架，賈靜雯會先稱讚對方，等氣消了再溝通，避免情緒化用詞傷害到對方，通常隔了10多分鐘，兩人就會和好。


大陸女星張歆藝曾透露夫妻相處之道，要「經常考慮對方的感受」。（翻攝自張歆藝微博）

大陸女星張歆藝與袁弘結婚育有一女，夫妻時常在SNS上鬥嘴曬恩愛，張歆藝曾透露相處之道要「經常考慮對方的感受」，此外，夫妻倆還共享朋友圈，毫不藏私，她說：「愛一個人就要跟他分享所有。」
更新時間｜2019.11.05 11:09

[Large cowardry] How to keep fresh with 16 years of marriage with Taozi? Li Liren flashed a word in the crowd
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Entertainment Group
Jay Chou and Kun Ling have been married for 4 years. They often love themselves on the social networking site. The couple’s feelings are very close. In fact, there are many couples in the entertainment industry. Tao Jingying and Li Liren, Jia Jingwen and Xiu Jie, the mainland actress Zhang Yiyi and Yuan Hong and so on are good demonstrations of marriage.



Tao Jingying (Taozi) and Li Liren have been married for 16 years. They have a pair of children who often wear love and mention the secret of marriage preservation. They often take time to date. Li Liren once praised Tao Tao as an indispensable companion in his life. He said: "I don't believe in religion, I don't worship God. I only believe in myself and my wife."


Jia Jingwen once shared the process of recognizing Shu Jie as a lifelong in the book Jia Ru Happiness Comes Slowly. (Reflected from Jia Jingwen's Facebook)

The 9-year-old sister-in-law, Jia Jingwen and Xiu Jiezhen completed the positive results in 2015. Jia Jingwen once shared the process of identifying the other party as a lifelong life in the book "Jiaru Happiness Comes Slowly". In order to express his sincerity, Xiu Jieyi once said to Jia Jingwen: "妳 promise me, if one day I go first, I must find another person to love." And it is this sentence that reminds her that Xiu Jie is the person she can entrust for the rest of her life. As long as the two quarrels, Jia Jingwen will first praise the other party, wait for the gas to disappear and then communicate, to avoid emotional use of words to hurt the other party, usually after more than 10 minutes, the two will reconcile.


Mainland actress Zhang Yiyi once revealed that husband and wife should get along with each other and "consider the feelings of each other." (Reflected from Zhang Yiyi Weibo)

Mainland actress Zhang Yiyi and Yuan Hong are married to have a woman. The couple often slap on the SNS and love. Zhang Yiyi has revealed that he has to "consider the feelings of the other side". In addition, the couple also share a circle of friends. She said: "Love someone and share everything with him."
